Description_lang: Summon a strong Blizzard that surrounds you for $d that slows enemies by $389823s2% and deals $390171s1 Frost damage every $390171d. Enemies that are caught in Snowdrift for $389823d consecutively become Frozen in ice, stunned for $389831d.
AuraDescription_lang: A strong Blizzard follows you and slows enemies. Enemies that are caught in the Blizzard for $389823d consecutively become Frozen in ice and stunned.

description_blz.en_US:
Summon a strong Blizzard that surrounds you for 6 sec that slows enemies by 70% and deals 1,247 Frost damage every 1 sec. 

Enemies that are caught in Snowdrift for 2 sec consecutively become Frozen in ice, stunned for 4 sec.
description_blz.es_MX:
Invoca una Ventisca fuerte que te rodea durante 6 s, ralentiza un 70% a los enemigos e inflige 1,237 p. de daño de escarcha cada 1 s. 

Los enemigos atrapados en el Ventisquero durante 2 s seguidos quedan Congelados en hielo y aturdidos durante 4 s.
description_blz.pt_BR:
Evoca uma Nevasca forte que envolve você por 6 s, desacelerando os inimigos em 70% e causando 1.250 de dano de Gelo a cada 1 s. 

Inimigos atingidos pelo Monte de Neve por 2 s sem interrupção ficam congelados e atordoados por 4 s.
description_blz.de_DE:
Beschwört einen starken Blizzard, der Euch 6 Sek. lang umgibt. Der Blizzard verlangsamt Gegner um 70% und verursacht alle 1 Sek. 1.244 Frostschaden.

Gegner, die sich 2 Sek. lang ununterbrochen im Effektbereich von 'Schneewehe' aufhalten, erstarren zu Eis und werden für 4 Sek. betäubt.
description_blz.en_GB:
Summon a strong Blizzard that surrounds you for 6 sec that slows enemies by 70% and deals 1,270 Frost damage every 1 sec. 

Enemies that are caught in Snowdrift for 2 sec consecutively become Frozen in ice, stunned for 4 sec.
description_blz.es_ES:
Invoca una poderosa Ventisca que te rodea durante 6 s, ralentiza un 70% a los enemigos y les inflige 1246 p. de daño de Escarcha cada 1 s.

Los enemigos atrapados en el Ventisquero durante 2 s se quedan congelados en hielo, lo que los aturde durante 4 s.
description_blz.fr_FR:
Vous invoquez autour de vous pendant 6 s un puissant blizzard qui ralentit les adversaires de 70% et leur inflige 1239 points de dégâts de givre toutes les 1 s.

Les adversaires pris dans Éclat de glace pendant 2 s consécutives sont congelés et étourdis pendant 4 s.
description_blz.it_IT:
Evoca una potente tormenta che ti circonda per 6 s, riducendo la velocità di movimento dei nemici del 70% e infliggendo 1.247 danni da gelo ogni 1 s.

I nemici colpiti da Cumulo di Neve per 2 s consecutivi diventano congelati e restano storditi per 4 s.
description_blz.ru_RU:
Призывает вокруг вас могучую снежную бурю на 6 сек. Буря замедляет противников на 70% и наносит 1234 ед. урона от магии льда раз в 1 сек. 

Противники, проводящие в области действия бури 2 сек. подряд, замерзают и оглушаются на 4 сек.
description_blz.ko_KR:
6초 동안 지속되는 강력한 눈보라로 자신을 감쌉니다. 눈보라는 적의 이동 속도를 70%만큼 감소시키고 1초마다 1,247의 냉기 피해를 입힙니다. 

적이 2초 연속으로 눈더미에 휘말린 상태로 있으면 얼음 속에 얼어붙어 4초 동안 기절합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW:
召喚圍繞著你的強烈暴風雪，持續6秒，暴風雪使敵人緩速70%，同時每1秒造成1,255點冰霜傷害。

持續待在雪堆範圍內達2秒的敵人會凍結成冰並陷入昏迷4秒。
description_blz.zh_CN:
一场猛烈的暴风雪跟随着你，持续6秒，使敌人减速70%，而且每1秒造成1,221点冰霜伤害。

被暴风雪连续命中2秒的敌人会被冻结在寒冰中，而且昏迷4秒。
